meaningMnemonic: You have four and you have thousand. Multiply them together and you have <vocabulary>four thousand</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. That's true for the 千 part, but the 四 reading is kun'yomi. You should know how to read this word as long as you've been studying your kanji!
